response.overview: Capital Tea is a pioneering organization dedicated to fostering a sustainable and inclusive life for the transgender community. Through advocacy, education, and empowerment initiatives, Capital Tea is committed to creating positive change and uplifting the lives of transgender individuals. Our latest PSA, "Trans-Forming Lives for the Better," sheds light on the resilience and strength of the transgender community, highlighting their journey towards empowerment and acceptance. Join us in supporting and celebrating the transformative impact of Capital Tea's work in creating a more equitable and compassionate society.
response.title: Trans-Forming Lives for the Better
